articles.author: Ahmet Begde, Eef Hogervorst, Thom Wilcockson
articles.title: How your vision can predict dementia 12 years before it is diagnosed – new study - The Conversation
articles.description: A loss of visual sensitivity could be an early predictor of dementia.
articles.content: The eyes can reveal a lot about the health of our brain. Indeed, problems with the eyes can be one of the earliest signs of cognitive decline. Our latest study shows that a loss of visual sensitivity… [+4580 chars]

articles.title: CERN pays tribute to Peter Higgs - CERN
articles.description: Peter Higgs has passed away at the age of 94. An iconic figure in modern science, Higgs in 1964 postulated the existence of the eponymous Higgs boson. Its discovery at CERN in 2012 was the crowning achievement of the Standard Model (SM) of particle physics – …
